set_ship_text.name: EMP

event.name: Spawning wave 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Hello again, meatbags. Behold, our ultimate weapon, the Iron Sun!

event.name: Spawning wave 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Let's invite some of your old friends, the Kraliens, to the party.

event.name: Spawning wave 7
event.incoming_comms_text: The Ximni are here too.

event.name: Spawning wave 9
event.incoming_comms_text: Looks like the Kraliens called for help of their Hegemony allies.

event.name: Spawning wave 12
event.incoming_comms_text: Im enjoying this.

event.name: Spawning wave 14
event.incoming_comms_text: We didn't invite Torgoths, but they must have scented your blood!

event.name: Spawning wave 16
event.incoming_comms_text: Can you feel the end?

event.name: Antenna A Spawning at spawner
event.incoming_comms_text: We're reading Kralien slingshot jump signatures!

event.name: Antenna B Spawning at spawner
event.incoming_comms_text: Incoming jump signatures, Arvonian configuration!

event.name: Antenna C Spawning at spawner
event.incoming_comms_text: Torgoth fleet just entered the system!

event.name: Asteroid Base Spawning at spawner
event.incoming_comms_text: We're reading a pirate raiding party on long range scanners!

event.name: Iron Sun Spawning at spawner
event.incoming_comms_text: Seismic activity on the Iron Star... More Caltrons!

event.name: Inform about Kugelblitz research
event.incoming_comms_text: We have found a weakness in Iron Sun! Stability of spacetime fabric around it is favorable for creating an artificial blackhole by focusing hypercooled lasers on a singular point - a Kugelblitz! Construct a Kugelblitz generator at Iron Sun's surface. Keep all sensors alive until the black hole is created.
